summary: Request to expose AbortController in the Workflow sandbox to enable compatibility with libraries like xstate that use it internally for promise-based actor implementations.
userImpact: Users cannot use libraries like xstate that depend on AbortController within Temporal workflows.
proposedFix: Expose AbortController API to the worker workflow sandbox, similar to how other global APIs are exposed.
resolutionDetails: AbortController was exposed to the workflow sandbox
keyQuote: Expose `AbortController` to the worker workflow sandbox.
